page.title: 14OTHER LOCAL NEWS ITEMS
page.content: Askam Town Band (1985) The South Cumbria Musical Festival was held between 26th-30th March inclusive. This dedicated band worked very hard in rehearsals leading up to the competition and achieved considerable success. In the solo entries, the quartet and full band catagories all marks were above 80%. Following this achievement the Band was invited, on 31st March, to share in the celebrations for the Millom Band's 125th anniversary. During the afternoon the bands played in the church at a special service and later that evening they again joined forces for a concert at Millom Conservative Club. The Band maintains its continued popularity by giving musical support to various local functions on request.
